name: biomni-query-emdb
title: Biomni: Query Emdb
description: Query the Electron Microscopy Data Bank (EMDB) for cryo-EM derived 3D structures of biological macromolecules.
content:
Overview

Accesses EMDB, the public repository for electron microscopy density maps of macromolecular structures. EMDB contains cryo-EM, electron tomography, and other EM-derived structural data, complementing X-ray crystallography structures in the PDB.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query about EM structures (e.g., "Find ribosome structures")
  • endpoint (string, optional): Specific EMDB API endpoint to query
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable detailed logging output (default: true)

Biological Use Case

Critical for structural biology research on large macromolecular complexes, membrane proteins, and cellular machinery that are challenging to crystallize. Researchers use EMDB to access cryo-EM structures of viruses, ribosomes, ion channels, and protein assemblies for understanding mechanism of action, drug design, and structural dynamics studies.

Output

Returns a parameters (emdb_results.json) containing EMDB entry details including map IDs, resolution information, associated PDB structures, biological assembly descriptions, sample preparation methods, microscopy parameters, and downloadable density map file locations.

Category

database
